Name: Mahjong Masters: Temple of the Ten Gods
About the game: The Northern kingdoms are at war which can only be stopped by divine intervention. The last survivor of the line of Amathean priests had a task to construct the ancient Temple of the Ten Gods and invoke the deities. Play numerous Mahjong Solitaire boards to collect the resources needed to construct the vast temple complex. Play the Mahjong Number Sum mini game to invoke the Gods. Return the Temple of the Ten Gods to its former glory! - A Mahjong Solitaire game with numerous layouts. A new tile layout every time. - An additional mode of game play with the new Mahjong Number Sum mini game - Make pair matches and collect the resources to construct the temple. - Rechargeable hints and magic eye power boosters - Shuffle tiles option
